verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Have Thine own way, Lord! Have Thine own way! Thou art the Potter, I am the clay. Mold me and make me after Thy will, While I am waiting, yielded and still.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Have Thine own way, Lord! Have Thine own way! Search me and try me, Master, today! Whiter than snow, Lord, wash me just now, As in Thy presence humbly I bow.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Have Thine own way, Lord! Have Thine own way! Wounded and weary, help me, I pray! Power, all power, surely is Thine! Touch me and heal me, Savior divine.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Have Thine own way, Lord! Have Thine own way! Hold oâ€™er my being absolute sway! Fill with Thy Spirit till all shall see Christ only, always, living in me.
